resources.string: Welcome to StuFriend and Thanks for Testing Our Beta Application.More Features will be added Soon.Stay Tune.
In this Application You can find Your Suitable Jobs and Internships of your Dream Companies.
You can find Previous Years Questions and Interview Questions of the Top Companies.
Here we also include Coding Problems and many Courses which will help you to grow up your skills.
NOTE - This App is now in Beta Condition.More Features will be added Soon.

Looks like you have an older
version of the app.
Please update to get latest
features and best experience.
